author: The Film Theorists
description:
Your theorizing can change the universe! Well… at least the Marvel Universe. A popular fan theory suggesting that Stan Lee could be The Watcher in the MCU gained so much traction, a well-known Marvel director decided to make it canon! 
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐
*Credits:*
Writers: Forrest Lee & Bob Chipman
Editor: AbsolutePixel
Sound Designer: Yosi Berman

title: Stan Lee is CANON in the Marvel Universe #shorts
